snippet.title: Mattel Intellivision Game: NASL Soccer (1979 Mattel Electronics)
snippet.description: A Sports game following typical soccer rules where you attempt to score more goals than your opponent in the two 45 minute periods (this is in simulated time). You control one player on your team at a time while the computer takes control of the rest. The game allows you to dribble and pass, and features throw ins, corner kicks, goal kicks, and in the event of a tie the game goes in to overtime! Several skill levels are available which control the speed of the game
